Candace Hill-Montgomery (amụrụ na Febụwarị 9, 1945) bụ ónyé édémédé America na ónyé na-ese ihe
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na foto, ngwakọta mgbasa ozi, na watercolors. A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Queens, New York City
Dị ka Hill-Montgomery si kwuo, nne ya bụ ónyé nkwado siri ike màkà mmepe nka ya. Ọ gara Mahadum Fordham (B.A., 1977) na Hunter College (M.A., 1981)

Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, na 1979, Hill-Montgomery bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-ebi na Studio Museum na Harlem ma gosipụta ọrụ ya na Artists Space. E nyere ya fellowship site na National Endowment for the Arts na 1981, na Guggenheim Fellowship na 1985. N'afọ 1980, o gosipụtara na Bronx Museum of the Arts, New Museum, Franklin Furnace, Fashion Moda, na Maryland Institute College of Art
N'afọ 1985, Hill-Montgomery haziri ihe ngosi nke ọrụ Lorna Simpson na Lucy R
Lippard nke akpọrọ Working Women/Working Artists/Worked Together.  O sonyere na ngosi "Race and Representation" na Hunter College Art Gallery na 1987
O bipụtara édémédé na Woman's Art Journal Ọrụ ya dị ugbu a na New Digital Archive Museum. Na Mee 2019, e gosipụtara nchịkọta Candace Hill-Montgomery na Sag Harbor Whaling & Historical Museum.
Ọrụ nka Candace Hill-Montgomery na-eji ihe ndị dị n'uwe na uri iji gosipụta nsogbụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site na iji ọchị na satire

Isiokwu ndị a na-akọwa n'ọrụ nka ya bụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ịda ogbenye na ụmụ nwanyị, ndị na-akwaga mba ọzọ na ụmụaka gbara ọsọ ndụ. Karịsịa, ihe osise ya "Free Dom with Purchase" (ihe na-ezo aka na ụdị champagne a ma ama - Dom Pérignon) na-egosi nwanyị Harlem nke na-azụ ahịa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iji nyéré ọbọdọ ya aka
Maka ọrụ nka a, Candace Hill-Montgomery jiri akwa tebụl na napkins na uri e dere na ha.
